title: Fiora Ultimate
body: Is it supposed to have a 3-5 sec delay before you can proc a mark, or was it supposed to be instant to proc instead of long as wait, it's no fun when you can't use it in a battle to heal up because it has that long wait to proc, so using it would just be a waste in most cases when the enemy has relatively low hp, and you end up killing them in that 3-5 sec period, o you don't get the heal reward.

replies.body:
No you probably cast it on someone and didn't pop any of the vitals.

You must pop at least one vital for the heal to go off.
using the ult then aa 5 times counts as not procing the vital when the aa was directly on the little triangle? seems legit. no there is just some stupid delay that won't work for a few seconds

keep up with the champions, most adc champs dont have a stun, neither does kat, talon or lee sin. Also, maybe you can't read, but aa 5 times in a row obviously means I wasn't stunned, it just has a stupid delay
